News.headline: Tickets: Eastleigh v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Eastleigh v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Eastleigh v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers' trip to the Silverlake Stadium on Saturday 8th October, 3:00pm KO.
News.description:
Dagenham & Redbridge’s supporters will be located in the either the East Stand Terrace or the Mackoy Community Stand.

Please note that Eastleigh offer cheaper tickets in advance for the game. Click the link here to buy tickets on Eastleigh's on-line ticket website.

Admission Prices:

Terracing:
Adult £15 - (£12 if brought in advance)
Concession (Over 65) - £10 (£8 if brought in advance)
Under 16s - £5 (£4 if brought in advance)
Under 7s - Free

Main Stand:
Adult - £18 (£15 if brought in advance)
Concession (Over 65) - £12 (£10 if brought in advance)
Under 16s - £7.50 (£5 if brought in advance)
Under 7s - £3 (£2 if brought in advance)

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Any disabled/wheelchair fans will pay the age equivalent with the carer going free of charge.
